class.name: DiscordppActivityInvite
class.description:
When one user invites another to join their game on Discord, it will send a message to that user. The SDK will parse those messages for you automatically, and this struct contains all of the relevant invite information which is needed to later accept that invite.
Reference: [url]https://discord.com/developers/docs/social-sdk/classdiscordpp_1_1ActivityInvite.html[/url]

method.name: ApplicationId
method.description: The target application of the invite.

method.name: ChannelId
method.description: The id of the Discord channel in which the invite was sent.

method.name: IsValid
method.description: Whether or not this invite is currently joinable. An invite becomes invalid if it was sent more than 6 hours ago or if the sender is no longer playing the game the invite is for.

method.name: MessageId
method.description: The id of the Discord message that contains the invite.

method.name: ParentApplicationId
method.description: The application id of the parent - this is only applicable if there is a parent for a publisher's suite of applications.

method.name: PartyId
method.description: The id of the party the invite was sent for.

method.name: SenderId
method.description: The user id of the user who sent the invite.

method.name: SessionId
method.description: The session id of the user who sent the invite.

method.name: Type
method.description: The type of invite that was sent.
